quotes: Sriskandarajah held various posts from 2004 to 2009, including Deputy Director of the left-leaning think tank, the Institute for Public Policy Research.
He was Director General of the Royal Commonwealth Society, from 2009 to 2012, the youngest ever person and the first non-Briton to head this 140-year-old organisation.
He was the Secretary General of CIVICUS, a global alliance of civil society organisations from January 2013 to December 2018.
He was previously a member of the High Level Panel on Humanitarian Finance from 2015 to 2016.
Sriskandarajah was Chief Executive of Oxfam GB from January 2019 to December 2023.
He was appointed Chief Executive of the New Economics Foundation in January 2024.
On 16 August 2003, Sriskandarajah married Trinidadian barrister Suzanne Julia Lambert in Trinidad, West Indies.

quotes: Sriskandarajah held various posts from 2004 to 2009, including Deputy Director of the left-leaning think tank, the Institute for Public Policy Research.
He was Director General of the Royal Commonwealth Society, from 2009 to 2012, the youngest ever person and the first non-Briton to head this 140-year-old organisation.
He was the Secretary General of CIVICUS, a global alliance of civil society organisations from January 2013 to December 2018.
He was previously a member of the High Level Panel on Humanitarian Finance from 2015 to 2016.
Sriskandarajah was Chief Executive of Oxfam GB from January 2019 to December 2023.
He was appointed Chief Executive of the New Economics Foundation in January 2024.
On 16 August 2003, Sriskandarajah married Trinidadian barrister Suzanne Julia Lambert in Trinidad, West Indies.
